projects.title: In-App Form
projects.description: Tracking development using a monitoring youth activity booklet. Implementing a youth activity booklet to track engagement between young people and volunteers and to demonstrate how each interaction raises their esteem. PHP, iOS, Android.

projects.title: Volunteer tracking system
projects.description: We have a foot in the door volunteer program. We would like to see how many hours volunteers have completed. PHP, iOS, Android.

projects.title: Website redesign
projects.description: Improving and adding functionality to the Culpeper Community Garden website (donation button, online membership forms).
